mapper.select: SELECT displayName, ingredientItemId, price, priceDate, imgUrl, queryCnt FROM onetable.ingredient_price_all order by queryCnt LIMIT #{limitIndex}, #{limitCnt};
SELECT ingredientSubjectIdx FROM ingredient_subject WHERE variety = #{query};
SELECT ingredientSubjectIdx FROM ingredient_subject WHERE variety LIKE CONCAT('%', #{variety}, '%')
SELECT displayName, price, ingredientItemId, imgUrl, priceDate FROM ingredient_price_all WHERE displayName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query},'%');
SELECT ingredientItemId, price, priceDate FROM ingredient_price WHERE ingredientItemId = #{ingredientItemId} ORDER BY priceDate desc LIMIT 7;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ingredient(ingredientItemId, displayName, imgUrl, unitAmount) VALUES (#{query});
INSERT INTO onetable.ingredient_subject (variety) SELECT #{variety} from DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT variety FROM onetable.ingredient_subject WHERE variety = #{variety});

INSERT INTO onetable.ingredient (ingredientItemId, ingredientSubjectIdx, unitIdx, unitAmount, displayName, imgUrl) SELECT #{ingredientItemId}, #{ingredientSubjectIdx}, #{unitIdx}, #{unitAmount}, #{displayName}, #{imgUrl} from DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT ingredientItemId FROM onetable.ingredient WHERE ingredientItemId = #{ingredientItemId});
mapper.select: SELECT unitIdx FROM onetable.unit WHERE unitName = #{unitStr};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO onetable.ingredient_price (ingredientItemId, price, priceDate) SELECT #{ingredientItemId}, #{price}, CURDATE() from DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT priceDate FROM onetable.ingredient_price WHERE ingredientItemId = #{ingredientItemId} and priceDate = CURDATE());
